name: PFUIT
description:
PFUIT

Game realise during trijam_197. More content will arrive soon !


CONTROL :
Deplacement --> W, A, S, D
Attack --> Left mouse
Wistle --> Right Mouse
(When you start the game, put it in full-screen, I don't know yet how resize the embed!)

DESCRIPTION :
You are a poor Cro-Magnon man trying to survive as best he can.
Armed with her 5 loyal dogs, it's up to you to separate them as best you can to get by as long as possible. (Don't forget to call them back if they are too far away :D)

All music, sounds and assets are original creations. Don't forget to quote the authors if you use them

Music & Sound : H.N.N
Asset / Sprite : SunniestCloud

DEVELOPERS :
Nereis & Inraste
